title: Flat Sans by Schizotype
content:
I'd like to introduce Flat Sans, a humanist grotesque type family from Schizotype Fonts. Available now from [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102900/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schizotype/flat-sans/) and [Fontspring](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317102900/http:/www.fontspring.com/fonts/schizotype/flat-sans), and currently stupidly discounted (if you can't beat 'em, join 'em!)

author: daverowland

comments.content: I'm defintely looking at buying this. A versatile, fully-featured, all-weight, friendly humanist sans that seems solidly made for a good price. Would work for most applications.
Thank you! And thanks for the order. Hope it's useful for you.

I'm sure it will be! I have a non-profit I do a bunch of workfor that's previously used Proxima Nova as their main font, and this has some similar proportions while being more humanist in construction, which I really like.

PS. Love those steep, prominent accents.
That single story /a/ is tha bomb for me. Sold! — I mean ‘Bought!’
This font and its variations looks really friendly. and there's also 70% off. Definitely must buy.
